Detailed Description

template<class TYPE>
class SAMRAI::pdat::OutersideDataFactory< TYPE >

Class OutersideDataFactory is a factory class used to allocate new instances of OutersideData objects. It is a subclass of the patch data factory class and outerside data is a subclass of patch data. Both the factory and data classes are templated on the type of the contained object (e.g., double or int).

See also:
pdat::OutersideData

pdat::PatchDataFactory

SAMRAI::pdat::OutersideDataFactory< TYPE >::OutersideDataFactory ( const tbox::Dimension &  dim,
const int  depth 
)

The default constructor for the outerside data factory class. The depth (number of components) gives the default for all of the outerside data objects created with this factory.

Virtual destructor for the outerside data factory class.

Member Function Documentation

template<class TYPE>
boost::shared_ptr< hier::PatchDataFactory > SAMRAI::pdat::OutersideDataFactory< TYPE >::cloneFactory ( const hier::IntVector &  ghosts  )  [virtual]

Abstract virtual function to clone a patch data factory.

This will return a new instantiation of the abstract factory with the same properties. The properties of the cloned factory can then be changed without modifying the original.

Parameters:
ghosts default ghost cell width for concrete classes created from the factory.

Implements SAMRAI::hier::PatchDataFactory.

template<class TYPE>
boost::shared_ptr< hier::PatchData > SAMRAI::pdat::OutersideDataFactory< TYPE >::allocate ( const hier::Patch &  patch  )  const [virtual]

Virtual factory function to allocate a concrete outerside data object. The default information about the object (e.g., depth) is taken from the factory.

Implements SAMRAI::hier::PatchDataFactory.

template<class TYPE>
boost::shared_ptr< hier::BoxGeometry > SAMRAI::pdat::OutersideDataFactory< TYPE >::getBoxGeometry ( const hier::Box &  box  )  const [virtual]

Allocate the box geometry object associated with the patch data. This information will be used in the computation of intersections and data dependencies between objects.

Implements SAMRAI::hier::PatchDataFactory.

template<class TYPE>
int SAMRAI::pdat::OutersideDataFactory< TYPE >::getDepth (  )  const

Get the depth (number of components). This is the depth that will be used in the instantiation of outerside data objects.

template<class TYPE>
size_t SAMRAI::pdat::OutersideDataFactory< TYPE >::getSizeOfMemory ( const hier::Box &  box  )  const [virtual]

Calculate the amount of memory needed to store the outerside data object, including object data and dynamically allocated data.

Implements SAMRAI::hier::PatchDataFactory.

template<class TYPE>
bool SAMRAI::pdat::OutersideDataFactory< TYPE >::fineBoundaryRepresentsVariable (  )  const [virtual]

Return a boolean true value indicating that fine data for the outerside quantity will take precedence on coarse-fine interfaces. See the OutersideVariable<DIM> class header file for more information.

Implements SAMRAI::hier::PatchDataFactory.

template<class TYPE>
bool SAMRAI::pdat::OutersideDataFactory< TYPE >::dataLivesOnPatchBorder (  )  const [virtual]

Return true since the outerside data index space extends beyond the interior of patches. That is, outerside data lives on patch borders.

Implements SAMRAI::hier::PatchDataFactory.

template<class TYPE>
bool SAMRAI::pdat::OutersideDataFactory< TYPE >::validCopyTo ( const boost::shared_ptr< hier::PatchDataFactory > &  dst_pdf  )  const

Return whether it is valid to copy this OutersideDataFactory to the supplied destination patch data factory. It will return true if dst_pdf is SideDataFactory or OutersideDataFactory, false otherwise.
